Testing pdf_repeat_table_rows
=============================

This table spans two pages. As the ``pdf_repeat_table_rows`` setting in ``conf.py`` is set to ``True``, we expect that the header is repeated on page 2.


.. widths:: 20 80

+-----------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|           Column 1          |                                                          Column 2                                                          |
+=============================+============================================================================================================================+
